channel.title: Need help on my drop procedure

item.title: Need help on my drop procedure
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Ok, do this like Junkj said:

[code]
program Chopper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}//Don’t worry its just another include

const
treecolor = 2132088;
trunkcolor = 4156042;
cutwait = 1223;
AxeEquipped=True;

Procedure Drop;
If (AxeEquipped=True) and (invcount=28) then
Begin
DropTo(1,28)
If (AxeEquipped=False) and (invcount=28) then
Begin
DropTo(2,28)
end;[/code]

Then make you main loop look like this:

begin SetupSRL; ActivateClient; Chop;//name of chopping procedure here Drop;//name of dropping procedure here until (false) end.

I believe thats it. Tell me if it not ill try to help

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on my drop procedure

item.title: Need help on my drop procedure
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

this doesnt need to be there but i recomend it to put…

ActivateClient;
Between

begin and
setupSRL;

like this

begin
ActivateClient;
setupSRL;

and thats it

ActivateClient; means…

ActivateClient;: automaticlly go to the RS window or the window you put the crosshair on to start the whole script on that.! [br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 11:13:41 AM[/size][hr]Download SRL At Villu-Reborn(site)
Then put dropall; in your script somewhere…i dont know where
That might work.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on my drop procedure

item.title: Need help on my drop procedure
item.dc:creator: @Juss756 Juss756
item.description:
@Juss756 wrote:

im making my own drop procedure for my power chopper and i have it right click on the log i have set as a DTM and i just need to know how to get the mouse to move down to select drop here is my procedure so far.

[scar]procedure droplogs;
begin
repeat
if (finddtm(log,x,y,550,203,746,468) then
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(684+random(234-500));
clickmouse(x,y,false)

//WHAT GOES HERE??? AND DID I DO EVERYTHING ELSE RIGHT?
end;
[/scar][br][size=1]Posted at: November 25, 2006, 11:01:04 PM[/size][hr]ok well here is my whole script im having problems so please help

[scar]program chopper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include RSCI.txt}

const
treecolor = 2132088;
trunkcolor = 4156042;
cutwait = 1223;

procedure hide;
begin
disguisescar=‘My Computer’
end;

procedure cut;
begin
repeat
if findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor,0,0,516,338) or
findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor,0,0,516,338) then
movemousesmooth(x,y)
istextat2(9,9,‘chop down’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(cutwait+random(234-454))
if(invfull = true) then
end;

procedure loadDTM; //loads log DTM
begin
log:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63F462626078CA8002527D75C1342394C’ +
‘F680F54F30055CDBABE0054351140352F50D5182828A0AA7106AA’ +
‘798FAAA62C5806558D3F50CD5D543545E126A86AEC30ED4257030’ +
‘0D20B0CE5’);
until(false)
end;

procedure droplogs;
begin
repeat
if (findDTM(log,x,y,550,203,746,468) then
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(684+random(234-500));
clickmouse(x,y,false)
end;

begin
setupSRL;
setupRSCI;
repeat
cut;
droplogs;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
